MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:34pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Broomhall Avenue substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20pm on Saturday, 17 April 2021
